item.description:
Rocky Horror Picture Show (Sing-A-Long)
Thursday Oct 1, 09
8 p.m. - 9:40 p.m.

Free with admission to Phoenix Art After Hours+ Sing along with this cult favorite! A newly engaged couple has a car breakdown in an isolated area and must seek help at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter. 1975. UK/USA. 98 min. Rated R. Directed by Jim Sharman.


Please visit the Wadsworth Atheneum site for directions and parking information. A shuttle service is available.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Rocky Horror Sing-A-Long, Wadsworth Atheneum, Oct. 1st
